title: Healthy Smoothie Recipes: Delicious Herbal Smoothie Recipe Book
description: Healthy Smoothie RecipesNot having enough nutrients to jump-start your day results in having lazy day; feeling sluggish and tired all day long. Book contains delicious smoothie recipes that are quick, easy to make, taste great and will definitely help you lose weight.100% proven methodsBenefits of drinking healthy smoothies are numerous; from weight-loss to reduction in cravings. Healthy smoothies are a powerful dietary supplement and natural energy booster. Try out new variations from a list of recipe ideas provided by this cookbook with detailed daily value for you and your family.Get yours today!
author: Violet Karma
